title: League is Too team centric
body:
Simply put. you cant carry a game if you are a good player, you need at least two/three other good players to carry games, and that, in the long run will make players less likely to play league and more likely to play other mobas , Example? Heroes of storm.

In heros, if you are a good player, there are lots of ways to carry the team, you can split push, you can get camps, which is something i think League needs, (camps that act as minions and affect the lanes), Bosses. which again affect lane pushing, and most importantly, the effect XP has on the game, a hero might get lots of kill on your noob teammate, but that doesnt mean hes stacking gold.

Please don't Start trash talking and saying negative stuff, as a previous diamond player i care about how this game moves forward, and if any Devs care, this is a players feedback.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Elias1724,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=A31IehRs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-25T19:00:59.179+0000)
>
> Are you kidding me right now? This is _supposed_ to be a team game. No single player _should_ be able to carry a game on his own.

Too many stupid variables like your bot lane afking after they get fb'd

One guy can carry a game way more than they ever should be able to.

Have you never seen a Kat, Leblanc, Akali, Master Yi, Udyr, Jax, etc. who preyed on the worst player on the enemy team until they could 1v4?  That's way more carrying than should ever be allowed in a 10 man game.

Heroes is FAR less geared towards this and it really seems like you haven't played either game very much.  In hots, your team is all locked at the same level and xp is shared.  So if anyone is snowballng, it's your whole team, and if that happens the game will be over within 5 minutes anyway.

1.  It's a team game.
2.  You are playing against other players.

Really, if you can't carry your team than that just means that players on the other team are carrying theirs.

They are people too, you know, and this applies to them just as well.
